Posts.Content: Apr 21, 2018 03:35PM Mom-mom wrote: I was 43 at first diagnosis (diagnosed at first mammo post pregnancy and nursing), and I was 52 at me second diagnosis (diagnosed at annual mammo). Did not quite make it to 10 years
Posts.Title: Would you mind sharing your age at time of diagnosis? ByFaith Gussy

Posts.Content: Aug 17, 2017 01:44PM Mom-mom wrote: Thanks Keep the Faith and T. Wills, for these helpful posts and info on options. T. Wills -- I will check in to the ponytail halo -- didn't even think about that option -- thanks for the tip! Any chance you can post a pick of just the ponytail halo? Helps to visualize. I guess I want to memorialize my hair somewhat -- sort of like keeping my kiddos first haircut locks! Peace to you and yours.
Posts.Title: Chemo Divas (online order) halo wig from own hair? Mom-mom hetheryh

Posts.Content: Mom-mom wrote: I'm debating about doing this (and running out of time), as I had my first TC round earlier this week. The Chemo Divas website shows a halo wig made with your own hair. Any pros/cons from someone who looked at doing or who did this with their own hair? Thanks! Dx 12/23/2007, IDC, Right, <1cm, Stage IA, Grade 1, 0/3 nodes, ER+/PR+, HER2- Surgery 1/19/2008 Lumpectomy: Right Hormonal Therapy 6/1/2008 Tamoxifen pills (Nolvadex, Apo-Tamox, Tamofen, Tamone) Dx 4/6/2017, IDC, Right, <1cm, Stage IA, Grade 1, 0/1 nodes Surgery 5/25/2017 Mastectomy: Right; Reconstruction (right): Tissue expander placement Radiation Therapy Breast Log in to post a reply
